thread.title: Sunrise Telecom Announces Common Share Transactions
thread.title_full: Sunrise Telecom Announces Common Share Transactions

author: admin
title: Sunrise Telecom Announces Common Share Transactions
text:
Sunrise Telecom Incorporated 
FREMONT, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Sunrise Telecom Incorporated (Pink Sheets: SRTI) (the “Company” or “Sunrise”) announced today that a large existing shareholder of the Company recently purchased an additional 14.5 million shares of the Company’s common stock from other shareholders in negotiated transactions at a price of $.0355 per share. 
If you have any questions, feel free to contact the Company at sunrisetelecominfo@sunrisetelecom.com . 
About Sunrise Telecom 
For investor information about Sunrise Telecom, please visit www.sunrisetelcom.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150925005611/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015 
Integrity Public Relations, Inc. for Sunrise TelecomKen Hagihara
